subject: Re: Order #SSN1622, how did it go?
description_text:
I have not received the quick release hub, I emailed service but I have not
had a reply.
I will hopefully leave a good review upon receiving the product.

On Fri, Jun 20, 2025 at 21:29 SIMSONN <no-reply@loox.io> wrote:

> Hello Pedro, We would be grateful if you shared how things look and feel.
> Your review helps us and the community that supports us, and it only takes
> a few
> seconds. ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌

conversations.body_text: Hi Pedro Siqueira,     I will contact our operations team on Monday to confirm whether any items were missed in the shipment. If something was indeed omitted, we will arrange an immediate reshipment and provide you with the tracking number. It’s also possible that the order was shipped in multiple packages. I will verify everything and get back to you on Monday!

That would be great, thank you!
Hopefully the second package was delayed but is under way.

On Sat, Jun 21, 2025 at 12:57 service@simsonn.com
ID 为 543 的工单已合并到此工单。

合并来自工单543  
      主题: Order #SSN1622  
      描述:  Hello, some of this order I placed earlier this month came in. It looks like I'm still waiting for the 2 quick release hubs.  
 Was that shipped separately, should I still be expecting this package?  
 The pedals look great!!  
 Thank you.
Hi Pedro Siqueira,    Here's your logistics tracking link, expect a logistics update tomorrow.  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=JSEXD2321658505YQ

Thank you so much for the update!
